titleStmt.title: The louers melancholy Acted at the Priuate House in the Blacke Friers, and publikely at the Globe by the Kings Maiesties Seruants.
titleStmt.author: Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.
Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619. Hymens triumph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Felix Kingston] for H. Seile, and are to be sold at the Tygers head in Saint Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The main plot is from: Daniel, Samuel. Hymens triumph.
A variant (STC 11163.3) has "printed for H.S." in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
